---
id: check-unbonding-eligibility
title: "Check unbonding eligibility"
description: "Checks if a delegation identified by its staking transaction hash is eligible for unbonding. This endpoint will be deprecated once all phase-1 delegations are either withdrawn or registered into phase-2."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Check unbonding eligibility"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/unbonding/eligibility"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Checks if a delegation identified by its staking transaction hash is eligible for unbonding. This endpoint will be deprecated once all phase-1 delegations are either withdrawn or registered into phase-2.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Staking Transaction Hash Hex","in":"query","name":"staking_tx_hash_hex","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"The delegation is eligible for unbonding"},"400":{"description":"Missing or invalid 'staking_tx_hash_hex' query parameter","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"err":{},"errorCode":{"enum":["INTERNAL_SERVICE_ERROR","VALIDATION_ERROR","NOT_FOUND","BAD_REQUEST","FORBIDDEN","UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY","REQUEST_TIMEOUT"],"type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["InternalServiceError","ValidationError","NotFound","BadRequest","Forbidden","UnprocessableEntity","RequestTimeout"],"title":"types.ErrorCode"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer"}},"type":"object","title":"github_com_babylonlabs-io_staking-api-service_internal_shared_types.Error"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
